description: C_{n+1}*C_n*C_{n-1}^2*C_{n-2}^4*...*C_2^{2^(n-2)}, where C_k are the Catalan numbers (A000108).
comments: Essentially the same as A003047, which is the main entry. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 23 2008]
references: D.-Z. Du and F. K. Hwang, Combinatorial Group Testing and Its Applications, World Scientific, 2nd ed., 2000; p. 36.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 22 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, May 22 2000
